dc_description_s: 1 map : col. ; 58 x 43 cm|Includes inset of St. Helena.|Nos. 89-90 in Johnson, A.J. Johnson's new illustrated (steel plate) family atlas... comp., drawn and engraved under the supervision of J.H. Colton and A.J. Johnson. 1861.|Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings.|Prime meridians: Washington and Greenwich.|Shows land and sea routes of various explorers.|Includes images of Cape Town and Port Natal.
